TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi SpecialDirectories extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供了用于访问经常引用的目录的属性。

span.span: Provides properties for accessing commonly referenced directories.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果引用的目录的路径为空，通常是由于不支持目录中，操作系统引发异常。If the path for the referenced directory is empty, usually due to the operating system not supporting the directory, a exception is thrown. 没有反斜杠 (\\) 将出现在路径末尾。No backslash (\\) appears at the end of the path. 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Computer.FileSystem.SpecialDirectories`对象。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.FileSystem.SpecialDirectories` object. |到To|请参阅See| |-|-| |从我的文档目录中读取Read from the MyDocuments directory|[如何：检索“我的文档”目录中的内容How to: Retrieve the Contents of the My Documents Directory](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/drives-directories-files/how-to-retrieve-the-contents-of-the-my-documents-directory.md)| ## 项目类型的可用性Availability by Project Type |项目类型Project type|可用Available| |-|-| |Windows 应用程序Windows Application|**是****Yes**| |类库Class Library|**是****Yes**| |控制台应用程序Console Application|**是****Yes**| |Windows 控件库Windows Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Web 控件库Web Control Library|**是****Yes**| |Windows 服务Windows Service|**是****Yes**| |网站Web Site|**是****Yes**| ## Examples 此示例返回`filePath`用户的桌面的目录中，显示它。This example returns the `filePath` for the user's Desktop directory and displays it. [!code-vb[VbVbcnMyFileSystem#80](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbcnMyFileSystem/VB/Class1.vb#80)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AllUsersApplicationData As String
public: static property System::String ^ AllUsersApplicationData { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取指向所有用户的 Application Data 目录的路径名称。

span.span: Gets a path name pointing to the Application Data directory for the all users.

value.span: 指向所有用户的 Application Data 目录的路径。

span.span: The path to the Application Data directory for the all users.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `SpecialDirectories`对象包含经常引用的目录的路径。The `SpecialDirectories` object contains paths to commonly referenced directories. ## Examples 此示例显示中的所有用户的应用程序数据目录的路径。This example displays the path to the Application Data directory for the all users in a . summary.span: 获取指向 Program Files 目录的路径。

The path to the **Program Files** directory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `SpecialDirectories`对象包含经常引用的目录的路径。The `SpecialDirectories` object contains paths to commonly referenced directories. **Program Files**目录包含计算机的程序文件。The **Program Files** directory contains the computer's program files. ## Examples 此示例中显示的路径**Program Files**目录中。This example displays the path for the **Program Files** directory in a .
